entry.title: Beneath the Layers
entry.summary:
Author: themistakenwolfe

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,329Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 801

Summary: It was a talent, really. The way Stiles could mask his pain, hide the bruises, and act like everything was fine. Years of practice made him a master at deception. The Sheriff was a hero in Beacon Hills, the man everyone respected. Who would believe his son was the one suffering behind closed doors? Stiles had figured out how to dull the scent of pain around the pack. Wolfsbane in small doses, masking agents in his detergent, and sheer force of will kept them from knowing. No one ever suspected. No one ever looked too close. And that was exactly how he wanted it. Until Derek.

entry.title: That Boy Is Corrupt
entry.summary:
Author: Nightowl_22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,275Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 14

Summary: When high school teacher Stiles Stillnski is caught in a compromising situation with a student, he becomes the target of blackmail by another student, the dangerously cunning Derek Hale. However, Derek's price isn't a passing grade—it's a carnal and degrading encounter with Stiles himself. Forced into an impossible choice to protect his career and freedom, Stiles agrees, only to discover the act unleashes a dark, mutual obsession that binds them together even more tightly than the secret that started it all.

entry.title: I Thought Duty Called But It Was Just My Past
entry.summary:
Author: Violin715

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,760Chapters: 9/19Kudos: 121

Summary: Stiles got shot because of his own reckless behavior and his superiors decide he should take some leave. What better way to celebrate his survival than going back to the place that managed to kill him twice?When he gets back to Beacon Hills, he finds it’s changed a bit. Scott working as a paramedic, a whole hospital team that knows about werewolves, and a supernaturally good high school Lacrosse team.Between the possibility or a new pack in town, a rumor about Stiles’s connection to a suspiciously familiar looking teen and all the pain meds he’s taking to make it through the day, what’s a guy to do first?

entry.title: Brutal
entry.summary:
Author: arthurvittal

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,095Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Amidst the forest bathed in the unparalleled light of the full moon, rain, blood, and mud intertwine with the fate of Stiles Stilinski, a young man on the brink of collapse between the genuine love of Derek Hale and the murderous violence of his ex, Theo Raeken. In the wake of pain, transformation, and buried secrets, Theo awakens to something he doesn't yet understand, but which consumes him from the inside out. Rage, instinct, memory, and fear drag him deeper into his obsession—which, in truth, had never left his mind. Meanwhile, Derek and Stiles try to resume a daily life that seems only possible through sarcasm, sharp jokes, and stolen kisses. But, unfortunately, Beacon Hills never forgets. And behind the tenderness lie wounds too deep, unconfessed sins, and a threat that breathes hungrily behind its shadows. This is an intense, overwhelming, and resilient novel. Where we talk about love in times of total darkness, about monsters that live inside and outside the skin, and about what remains of us when we are forced to survive, between brutality and kindness.

entry.title: All Hale Caffeine - Book 1
entry.summary:
Author: Molly_Is_A_Fangirl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,595Chapters: 5/15Kudos: 65

Summary: Prompt: Coffee shop Au where the owner is increasingly concerned about the amount of caffeine this customer is ingesting.Derek returned to Beacon Hills with his sister once she’d finished college. He’d attended business school for a few years and decided that he’d open his own coffee shop: All Hale Caffeine - Laura picked it. They had gotten the shop up and running while visiting his uncle who was slowly starting to get better and working on rebuilding the old house. After all, it was time to start living again.Stiles Stilinski was 17, a spark, and just trying to finish high school. That proves impossible when his best friend gets bitten by a rogue alpha. Queue the Hales entering their lives as Stiles and Scott deal with the mess they’ve found themselves in. At least Stiles is getting good coffee out of this ordeal - if only the Sourwolf owner would stop commenting on his health.A Season 1 AU Rewrite - where the Hales return two-ish years before season 1’s events. Peter doesn’t go insane, Scott still gets bitten, and Stiles already knows about the supernatural world. Oh, and Derek had actual therapy while in New York.

entry.title: Keystone Species
entry.summary:
Author: SpaceflowerGrace

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,599Chapters: 8/10Kudos: 92

Summary: They didn't talk much about why Stiles was back in town. His mother had been inordinately proud of that fact she went into labor and delivered Stiles alone in the woods. It was the eighties, she couldn’t exactly call her husband on her cell phone. Stiles was born healthy in the preserve. Scott got hurt. Scott is Stiles to protect. He always has been. Stiles is pissed about quite a few things. “Scott is my fifteen year old cousin! And you hurt him and then left him alone and hurt? What’s wrong with you?” He has gotten very close to Derek’s face. Stiles takes a breath and turns away. Or- what if Stiles was the responsible adult at home?

entry.title: fucked around and found out
entry.summary:
Author: Sterektrashbag (vannybees)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,522Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 81

Summary: Two truckers come out of the diner laughing loudly and make their way to the building housing the bathrooms.That’s when Stiles gets out of his jeep, ducks his head and makes his way to the same building on quick feet.A dark suspicion slithers into his mind and Derek sniffs the air seeking Stiles on the wind as Stiles disappears into the building’s door, after the truckers.What he smells freezes him to his core, it confirms his dark suspicion and makes Derek’s brain malfunction for a few seconds.Stiles is aroused. He smells of lust and excitement with a hint of shame. Derek knows exactly what Stiles is doing here and his brain jumpstarts and in the next second he’s sprinting across the street getting honked at by a car passing by and continues running until he’s nearly pulling the building’s door off its hinges in his haste to get inside of it, blood boiling in his veins.

entry.title: Sixteen Candles and Steel
entry.summary:
Author: Foxywho93

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,165Chapters: 9/9Kudos: 41

Summary: Stiles has always been the kid on the outside looking in — until his soulmark ties him to Derek Hale, the star athlete from the family everyone admires. But when tragedy strikes and the Hales open their home to him, Stiles learns that love isn’t just written on your skin… it’s built in every moment of being chosen.A story about soulmates, scars, and the family you find along the way.
